name: Sun Up
description:
This is my first ever to upload a game for a Ludum Dare (46) Game Jam. This is still very much incomplete but still I wanted to post something

You control the sun and you have to keep a Solar-Powered car up and running by avoiding shadows.
Controls:
WASD

Sorry it is incomplete. Enjoy it still though :)

Tools Used:
- Unity
- MagicaVoxel
- Trello
